title: Naughty in the Tower: Erotic Romance Fantasy Special
description: Bayley and Shane just purchased a new home, and it was awesome! On the second day of their move, Bayley found a secret door that's been boarded up and sealed to keep it secret. Behind the door was a small ante-room with a staircase that led to a small circular room up in the tower. She wondered about what the room was for and why past owners tried to hide it. When Shane got back home from an errand and followed her to the room, she found out.Or rather, they both found out. They barely were able to remove their clothes!Thinking straight only after they'd left the room, Bayley and Shane tried to investigate the reason behind their fantastic experience. And that's how they found out the controversial history of that room.It was totally wicked. And they're more than excited to try it again, and again, and again...
author: Sandra Ross
